original_text:
You will surely forget your trouble,
    recalling it only as waters gone by.
korean_text: 곧 네 환난을 잊을 것이라 네가 기억할지라도 물이 흘러감 같을 것이며

sentences.original_text: You will surely forget your trouble
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 반드시 당신의 고난을 잊을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: recalling it only as waters gone by
